The numbers will still indicate the speed. On main dial Parameter to be shown on main dial Connect sound Play sound when Wheel connects or disconnects Connection lost beeps period Period of beeps when connection lost, 0sec - no beeps Auto mute Auto mute at speeds below 3.5 km/h Battery capacity Battery Capacity in Wh Charging power Charging Power in A Show Bluetooth without name. Show Bluetooth devices without name. Sound of connection. Sound of connection to the wheel. Enable Alarms Allow the phone to vibrate as a warning Disable Phone Vibration Phone will not vibrate but the alarm will be passed to a connected Pebble Watch Disable Phone Beep Phone will not beep but the alarm will be passed to a connected Pebble Watch Use Wheel built-in Beep for Alarm Alarm will send to an internal beeper instead audio PWM based alarms Use PWM based alarms model on voltage and capabilities of wheel Altered alarms options Rotation speed Rotation (lift-up) speed of your wheel Rotation voltage Voltage at which rotation speed was measured Power factor Don\'t change if you don\'t understand what is that, default=90 PWM alarm start Calculated PWM on which first alarm starts PWM alarm max Calculated PWM on which alarm becomes permanent Third alarm PWM Should be higher than second alarm Advance warning Advance speed warning, 0 - off Advance warning PWM Advance PWM warning, 0 - off Frequency of warnings Notification period, 0 - off Short display of PWM Current/Max PWM is displayed at about speed Beginning of PWM color coding Minimum PWM value to be indicated by color Limit of PWM color coding PWM limit value to be indicated by color Speed Alarm 1 Speed that triggers the alarm Speed Alarm 2 Speed Alarm 3 Battery Percent Battery percent that activates the alarm Battery Percent Battery Percent Current Alarm Current Current that triggers the alarm Temperature Alarm Temperature Temperature that triggers the alarm Battery level Alarm Battery level Battery level that triggers the alarm Wheel Alarm by Wheellog Alarm that triggers by wheel alarm speed current No data available Auto Log Start logging automatically when a wheel is connected Upload to electro.club Automatically upload log files to electro.club site. GPS must be turned on. GPS is more accurate but may consume more battery power Write Raw data Off/On/Strobe Soft/Medium/Hard Mode1/Mode2/Mode3/Mode4 Low/Medium/High Alarm settings Alarm Mode Calibration Calibration success Calibration fail Ride mode change success Ride mode change fail Remote control success Remote control fail Light state change success Light state change fail Handle button success Handle button fail Speaker control success Speaker control fail My Wheel is a Gotway MCM If your wheel is Gotway MCM, and it shows wrong speed, distance and others parameters, it should make them normal Switch controller in Miles on - Miles, off - Km Auto detect wheel voltage If possible, switch off if voltage is irrelevant Wrong 18L distanse 18L use to show wrong distance, WheelLog corrects this number, but if you want to see wrong raw numbers from wheel - check this Extreme Mode For stunts only! Not intended for normal riding! Braking Current The force with which the motor will be braked after the switch-off. Rotation Control Function for the Front Flip trick. Automatically engages the wheel after rotating it by a preset angle. Rotation Angle The angle of rotation after which to turn on the motor. Advanced Settings Activates the settings for PID controllers and compensations. Works only in pedal mode 4! Proportional Factor Proportional factor of PID horizon retention controller. Integral Factor Integral Factor of PID horizon retention controller. Differential Factor Differential Factor of PID horizon retention controller. Dynamic Compensation Dynamic horizon angle compensation. Dynamic Compensation Filter Dynamic horizon angle compensation filter factor. Acceleration Compensation Compensation for horizon deviations caused by wheel acceleration/deceleration. Proportional Current Factor Q Proportional current factor Q of the motor. Integral Current Factor Q Integral current factor Q of the motor. Proportional Current Factor D Proportional current factor D of the motor. Integral Current Factor D Integral current factor D of the motor. After connect to wheel Auto watch Start watch service automatically when a wheel is connected Detection of battery optimization Battery optimization Optimization of the phone\'s battery has been detected, this may lead to unexpected closing of the application. To fix this, go to the battery settings and disable optimization for WheelLog. Battery optimization - All apps - WheelLog - Don\'t optimize. Go to app info Go to battery settings Continue the log of this day The trip log is added until the next day comes. Finish the trip? The trip will not continue the next time the log is enabled. Setup PWM To correctly calculate and display the PWM, configure the wheel spin data. We need the maximum speed, and the voltage at which it was measured. 1. Manual setup max speed and voltage: 2. Auto. You need to spin wheel on air. 3. Select from template: Send usage statistics This application uses the AppMetrica analytics service provided by Yandex. Geolocation is not sent. The information collected in this way will be used to resolve errors and cannot identify you. Map Stats Could not open the file. Failed to create inputStream. %s file does not contain geolocation data. Unexpected exception when parsing file. Go to Settings GPS is turned off on the phone. The option to use GPS data for log recording is enabled in the settings. Enable gps or disable gps recording setting.
